text: @realDonaldTrump I give you the greatest nation on earth, leading the world in Coronavirus deaths, with 30 million unemployed and major cities burning. I would say there is some good news with the SpaceX launch, but the company is owned by an immigrant, and we hate immigrants.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

entity.name: SpaceX launches Crew Dragon with two NASA astronauts onboard
entity.description: NASA astronauts Doug Hurley and Bob Behnken are now on their way to the ISS aboard SpaceX’s Crew Dragon. The flight marks the first-ever crewed space launch by a private company, and is the first crewed NASA launch from US soil since 2011.

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
